languages.text:
If the target of this axe's attack is suffering from the effect of {g|f:197b8a8a12b0442db7ffee1067cf3d97}Expose Weakness{/g}, all {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} dealt to the target is increased by +{uip|Debuff|6ceac4db06434d3eae9c7839290aaf1d}% until the end of combat.
If the target of the attack is not suffering from both {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} and {g|f:197b8a8a12b0442db7ffee1067cf3d97}Expose Weakness{/g}, both of these effects are inflicted on the target after the attack.

traits.locale_text:
If the target of this axe's attack is suffering from exposed, all {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} dealt to the target is increased by +<u>(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% until the end of combat.
If the target of the attack isn't suffering from both {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} and exposed, exposed and exploit are inflicted on the target after the attack.

If the target of this axe's attack is suffering from the effect of Expose Weakness, all {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} dealt to the target is increased by +(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})% until the end of combat. If the target of the attack is not suffering from both {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} and Expose Weakness, both of these effects are inflicted on the target after the attack.

If the target of this axe's attack is suffering from the effect of Expose Weakness, all {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} dealt to the target is increased by +{uip|Debuff|6ceac4db06434d3eae9c7839290aaf1d}% until the end of combat. If the target of the attack is not suffering from both {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} and Expose Weakness, both of these effects are inflicted on the target after the attack.

If the target of this axe's attack is suffering from the effect of Expose Weakness, all {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} dealt to the target is increased by +{uip|Debuff|6ceac4db06434d3eae9c7839290aaf1d}% until the end of combat. If the target of the attack is not suffering from both {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} and Expose Weakness, both of these effects are inflicted on the target after the attack.

languages.text:
如果这把战斧攻击的目标受到{g|f:197b8a8a12b0442db7ffee1067cf3d97}暴露弱点{/g}效果影响，则该目标受到的所有{g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}能量伤害{/g}提高{uip|Debuff|6ceac4db06434d3eae9c7839290aaf1d}%，效果持续至战斗结束。
如果攻击目标没有同时受到{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}研究{/g}与{g|f:197b8a8a12b0442db7ffee1067cf3d97}暴露弱点{/g}效果影响，则此武器攻击结束后会同时施加两种效果。
languages.original_text:
If the target of this axe's attack is suffering from the effect of {g|f:197b8a8a12b0442db7ffee1067cf3d97}Expose Weakness{/g}, all {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} dealt to the target is increased by +{uip|Debuff|6ceac4db06434d3eae9c7839290aaf1d}% until the end of combat.
If the target of the attack is not suffering from both {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} and {g|f:197b8a8a12b0442db7ffee1067cf3d97}Expose Weakness{/g}, both of these effects are inflicted on the target after the attack.

traits.locale_text:
如果受到攻击的目标受到“暴露”效果影响，则该目标承受的所有{g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}能量伤害{/g}提高<u>（3×{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）</u>%，效果持续至战斗结束。
如果攻击目标没有受到{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}研究{/g}与“暴露”效果影响，则此武器的攻击会施加“研究”与“暴露”效果。
如果这把战斧攻击的目标受到暴露弱点效果影响，则该目标受到的所有{g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}能量伤害{/g}提高{uip|Debuff|6ceac4db06434d3eae9c7839290aaf1d}%，效果持续至战斗结束。 如果攻击目标没有同时受到{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}研究{/g}与暴露弱点效果影响，则此武器攻击结束后会同时施加两种效果。

languages.text: この斧の攻撃のターゲットが弱点の露呈効果を受けている場合、戦闘終了時まで、ターゲットに与えるすべての{g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}エネルギーダメージ{/g}が＋{uip|Debuff|6ceac4db06434d3eae9c7839290aaf1d}%増加する。 ターゲットが{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}エクスプロイト{/g}と弱点の露呈の両方の効果を受けていない場合、攻撃後に両方の効果が対象に与えられる。
languages.original_text: If the target of this axe's attack is suffering from the effect of Expose Weakness, all {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} dealt to the target is increased by +{uip|Debuff|6ceac4db06434d3eae9c7839290aaf1d}% until the end of combat. If the target of the attack is not suffering from both {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} and Expose Weakness, both of these effects are inflicted on the target after the attack.

traits.locale_text:
この斧の攻撃のターゲットが露出で苦しんでいない場合、戦闘終了時までターゲットに与えるすべての{g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}エネルギーダメージ{/g}が<u>（3×{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}）</u>％増加する。
攻撃ターゲットが {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}エクスプロイト{/g}と露出の両方に苦しんでいない場合、攻撃後にエクスプロイトと露出がターゲットに与えられる。

この斧の攻撃のターゲットが弱点の露呈効果を受けている場合、戦闘終了時まで、ターゲットに与えるすべての{g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}エネルギーダメージ{/g}が＋{uip|Debuff|6ceac4db06434d3eae9c7839290aaf1d}%増加する。 ターゲットが{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}エクスプロイト{/g}と弱点の露呈の両方の効果を受けていない場合、攻撃後に両方の効果が対象に与えられる。

languages.text:
Если на цель атаки наложен эффект {g|f:197b8a8a12b0442db7ffee1067cf3d97}Выявление слабостей{/g}, весь наносимый ей {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}энергетический урон{/g} увеличивается на {uip|Debuff|6ceac4db06434d3eae9c7839290aaf1d}% до конца боя.
Если на цели нет {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}уязвимости{/g} и {g|f:197b8a8a12b0442db7ffee1067cf3d97}выявления слабостей{/g}, то оба этих эффекта накладываются на нее после атаки.
languages.original_text:
If the target of this axe's attack is suffering from the effect of {g|f:197b8a8a12b0442db7ffee1067cf3d97}Expose Weakness{/g}, all {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} dealt to the target is increased by +{uip|Debuff|6ceac4db06434d3eae9c7839290aaf1d}% until the end of combat.
If the target of the attack is not suffering from both {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} and {g|f:197b8a8a12b0442db7ffee1067cf3d97}Expose Weakness{/g}, both of these effects are inflicted on the target after the attack.

traits.locale_text:
Если на цель атаки наложен эффект {g|f:197b8a8a12b0442db7ffee1067cf3d97}Выявление слабостей{/g}, весь наносимый ей {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}энергетический урон{/g} увеличивается на {uip|Debuff|6ceac4db06434d3eae9c7839290aaf1d}% до конца боя.
Если на цели нет {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}уязвимости{/g} и {g|f:197b8a8a12b0442db7ffee1067cf3d97}выявления слабостей{/g}, то оба этих эффекта накладываются на нее после атаки.

Если на цель атаки наложен эффект "раскрытие", весь наносимый ей {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}энергетический урон{/g} увеличивается на <u>(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}ИНТ{/g})</u>% до конца боя.
Если на цели нет {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}уязвимости{/g} и раскрытия, то оба этих эффекта накладываются на нее после атаки.

Если на цель атаки наложен эффект Выявление слабостей, весь наносимый ей {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}энергетический урон{/g} увеличивается на {uip|Debuff|6ceac4db06434d3eae9c7839290aaf1d}% до конца боя. Если на цели нет {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}уязвимости{/g} и выявления слабостей, то оба этих эффекта накладываются на нее после атаки.

languages.text:
Si el objetivo del hacha sufre los efectos de {g|f:197b8a8a12b0442db7ffee1067cf3d97}Exponer debilidad{/g}, el {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}daño elemental{/g} infligido al objetivo aumenta un +{uip|Debuff|6ceac4db06434d3eae9c7839290aaf1d} % hasta el final del combate.
Si el objetivo del ataque no sufre de {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}vulnerabilidad{/g} y {g|f:197b8a8a12b0442db7ffee1067cf3d97}Exponer debilidad{/g}, inflige ambos efectos al objetivo tras el ataque.
languages.original_text:
If the target of this axe's attack is suffering from the effect of {g|f:197b8a8a12b0442db7ffee1067cf3d97}Expose Weakness{/g}, all {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} dealt to the target is increased by +{uip|Debuff|6ceac4db06434d3eae9c7839290aaf1d}% until the end of combat.
If the target of the attack is not suffering from both {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} and {g|f:197b8a8a12b0442db7ffee1067cf3d97}Expose Weakness{/g}, both of these effects are inflicted on the target after the attack.

traits.locale_text:
Si el objetivo del hacha está expuesto, el {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}daño elemental{/g} infligido al objetivo aumenta un +<u>(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g})</u> % hasta el final del combate.
Si el objetivo del ataque no sufre {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}vulnerabilidad{/g} y exposición, inflige ambos efectos al objetivo tras el ataque.

Si el objetivo del hacha sufre los efectos de Exponer debilidad, el {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}daño elemental{/g} infligido al objetivo aumenta un +{uip|Debuff|6ceac4db06434d3eae9c7839290aaf1d} % hasta el final del combate. Si el objetivo del ataque no sufre de {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}vulnerabilidad{/g} y Exponer debilidad, inflige ambos efectos al objetivo tras el ataque.

languages.text:
Sollte das Angriffsziel dieser Axt unter dem Effekt {g|f:197b8a8a12b0442db7ffee1067cf3d97}Schwäche offenlegen{/g} leiden, wird der gesamte verursachte {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}Energieschaden{/g} bis zum Ende des Kampfes um +{uip|Debuff|6ceac4db06434d3eae9c7839290aaf1d} % erhöht.
Ist das Ziel nicht mit {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}Ausnutzen{/g} und {g|f:197b8a8a12b0442db7ffee1067cf3d97}Schwäche offenlegen{/g} belegt, werden ihm beide Effekte nach dem Angriff zugefügt.
languages.original_text:
If the target of this axe's attack is suffering from the effect of {g|f:197b8a8a12b0442db7ffee1067cf3d97}Expose Weakness{/g}, all {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} dealt to the target is increased by +{uip|Debuff|6ceac4db06434d3eae9c7839290aaf1d}% until the end of combat.
If the target of the attack is not suffering from both {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} and {g|f:197b8a8a12b0442db7ffee1067cf3d97}Expose Weakness{/g}, both of these effects are inflicted on the target after the attack.

traits.locale_text:
Sollte das Angriffsziel dieser Axt unter Exponiert leiden, werden sämtliche dem Ziel zugefügte {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}Energieschäden{/g} bis zum Ende des Kampfes um +<u>(3× {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g})</u> % erhöht.
Sollte das Ziel nicht unter {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}Ausnutzen{/g} und Exponiert leiden, werden diese Effekte dem Effekt nach dem Angriff zugefügt.

Sollte das Angriffsziel dieser Axt unter dem Effekt Schwäche offenlegen leiden, wird sämtlicher dem Ziel zugefügter {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}Energieschaden{/g} bis zum Ende des Kampfes um +{uip|Debuff|6ceac4db06434d3eae9c7839290aaf1d} % erhöht. Sollte das Ziel nicht unter {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}Ausnutzung{/g} und Schwäche offenlegen leiden, werden beide Effekte dem Ziel nach dem Angriff zugefügt.

languages.text:
Si la cible frappée par cette hache est sous l'effet de {g|f:197b8a8a12b0442db7ffee1067cf3d97}Mise en évidence des points faibles{/g}, tous les {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}dégâts d'énergie{/g} qui lui sont infligés augmentent de +{uip|Debuff|6ceac4db06434d3eae9c7839290aaf1d} % jusqu'à la fin du combat.
Si la cible de l'attaque ne subit ni {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}vulnérabilité{/g} ni {g|f:197b8a8a12b0442db7ffee1067cf3d97}Mise en évidence des points faibles{/g}, ces effets lui sont infligés après l'attaque.
languages.original_text:
If the target of this axe's attack is suffering from the effect of {g|f:197b8a8a12b0442db7ffee1067cf3d97}Expose Weakness{/g}, all {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} dealt to the target is increased by +{uip|Debuff|6ceac4db06434d3eae9c7839290aaf1d}% until the end of combat.
If the target of the attack is not suffering from both {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} and {g|f:197b8a8a12b0442db7ffee1067cf3d97}Expose Weakness{/g}, both of these effects are inflicted on the target after the attack.

traits.locale_text:
Si la cible de l'attaque portée à l'aide de cette hache est sous l'effet de Mise en Évidence des Points Faibles, tous les {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}dégâts d'énergie{/g} qui lui sont infligés augmentent de +<u>(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g})</u> % jusqu'à la fin du combat.
Si la cible de l'attaque ne subit aucun {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} ni l'effet Mise en Évidence des Points Faibles, ceux-ci lui sont infligés après l'attaque.

Si la cible de l'attaque portée à l'aide de cette hache est sous l'effet de Mise en Évidence des Points Faibles, tous les {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}dégâts d'énergie{/g} qui lui sont infligés augmentent de +{uip|Debuff|6ceac4db06434d3eae9c7839290aaf1d} % jusqu'à la fin du combat. Si la cible de l'attaque ne subit ni {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} ni l'effet Mise en Évidence des Points Faibles, ceux-ci lui sont infligés après l'attaque.

languages.text:
Bu baltanın saldırısının hedefi, {g|f:197b8a8a12b0442db7ffee1067cf3d97}Zayıflığı İfşa Et{/g} kabiliyetinin etkisi altındaysa hedefe verilen tüm {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}enerji hasarı{/g}, +%{uip|Debuff|6ceac4db06434d3eae9c7839290aaf1d} kadar artar. Etkisi çatışma sonuna dek sürer.
Saldırının hedefi, {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}sömürüden{/g} ve {g|f:197b8a8a12b0442db7ffee1067cf3d97}Zayıflığı İfşa Et{/g} kabiliyetinden muzdarip değilse saldırıyla beraber bu iki etkiye de maruz kalır.
languages.original_text:
If the target of this axe's attack is suffering from the effect of {g|f:197b8a8a12b0442db7ffee1067cf3d97}Expose Weakness{/g}, all {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} dealt to the target is increased by +{uip|Debuff|6ceac4db06434d3eae9c7839290aaf1d}% until the end of combat.
If the target of the attack is not suffering from both {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} and {g|f:197b8a8a12b0442db7ffee1067cf3d97}Expose Weakness{/g}, both of these effects are inflicted on the target after the attack.
